detaileddescription.para: This function configures SPI TX FIFO threshold.

parameterdescription.para: The FIFO threshold value, the value should not greater than FIFO size.

detaileddescription.para: This function configures SPI RX FIFO threshold.

parameterdescription.para: The FIFO threshold value, the value should not greater than FIFO size.

detaileddescription.para: This function configures the Rx and Tx DMA mask of the SPI. The parameters are base and a DMA mask.

parameterdescription.para: The dma enable mask; Use the spi_dma_enable_t.

detaileddescription.para: This function configures the Rx and Tx DMA mask of the SPI. The parameters are base and a DMA mask.

parameterdescription.para: The dma enable mask; Use the spi_dma_enable_t.

parameterdescription.para: The interrupt mask; Use the spi_interrupt_t.

parameterdescription.para: The interrupt mask; Use the spi_interrupt_t.
